description: A report by the island's government finds "no clear" policies on how to tackle monetary corruption.
title: 'Significant' threat of overseas financial crime in Jersey
title_page: 'Significant' threat of overseas financial crime in Jersey - BBC News
maintext: The report states Jersey's Financial Crime Strategy Group had not developed "an overarching policy or strategy on tackling financial crime" and had failed to play "a proactive role" in determining how anti-money laundering resources could be used.
